36#include "krb5_locl.h"
37
38KRB5_LIB_FUNCTION PA_DATA * KRB5_LIB_CALL
39krb5_find_padata(PA_DATA *val, unsigned len, int type, int *idx)
40{
41 for(; *idx < (int)len; (*idx)++)
42 if(val[*idx].padata_type == (unsigned)type)
43 return val + *idx;
44 return NULL;
45}
46
47KRB5_LIB_FUNCTION int KRB5_LIB_CALL
48krb5_padata_add(krb5_context context, METHOD_DATA *md,
49 int type, void *buf, size_t len)
50{
51 PA_DATA *pa;
52
53 pa = realloc (md->val, (md->len + 1) * sizeof(*md->val));
54 if (pa == NULL)
55 return krb5_enomem(context);
56 md->val = pa;
57
58 pa[md->len].padata_type = type;
59 pa[md->len].padata_value.length = len;
60 pa[md->len].padata_value.data = buf;
61 md->len++;
62
63 return 0;
64}
65
